title: The past 10 years of molecular ferroelectrics: structures, design, and properties
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00262D, Review Article
Qiang Pan, Zhu-Xiao Gu, Ru-Jie Zhou, Zi-Jie Feng, Yu-An Xiong, Tai-Ting Sha, Yu-Meng You, Ren-Gen Xiong
Herein, a comprehensive review of appealing developments of molecular ferroelectrics over the past 10 years is presented, with an emphasis on their structural diversity, chemical design, exceptional properties, and potential applications.
